entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider `PublishReadyToRun=true` as the default for Windows `Release` builds #9299
    .NET 7
  • Dependency Injection: Attempted to access a missing method #9298
  • Reland #7143 ([X] simpilfy and avoid duplication in conversion) #9294
    7.0-rc1
  • Colors render as black #9292
  • Android: When opening the app by clicking on a push notification, Application.OnResume is not called. #9290
  • MAUI Blazor for Windows: PushModalAsync-Issue #9288
  • Running various Samples in .NET MAUI source code. #9283
  • [MAC-CATALYST] PressesBegan getting triggered twice on Space bar press. #9282
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [MAC-CATALYST] PressesCancelled getting triggered on every key press. #9281
  • Windows ToolBarItems text size difference between page types #9279
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange in the lifecycle events and/or MauiUIApplicationDelegate #7012
    6.0-servicing
  • .SVG files not showing up on IOS #9265
  • [WinUI] Button.LineBreakMode currently not working #5580
    6.0-servicing
  • Shell with SVG icons #9291
  • Windows Layout InputTransparencyInitializesCorrectly(true) test currently failing #9112
    6.0-sr5
  • Is Maui UseMauiCompatibility() with handlers.AddCompatibilityRenderer extension buggy? #9229
  • Static Color methods not converting values e.g Color.FromRgba #9232

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the TFM order for VS #9297
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1264.42 to 1.0.1293.44 #9284
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [NET7.0][Tizen] Bump up SamsungTizenSdkPackageVersion #9280
    community ✨

Merged

  • [iOS] Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange method in lifecycle events #7526
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, 7.0-rc1
  • Bump xunit.runner.utility from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9258
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Potential nullability fix #9296
  • Add props file that allows us to easily isolate to a single TFM #9195
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Use the versions by maestro #9289
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix broken fabricbot links #9293
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, area/infrastructure 🏗️, control-dualscreen, .NET 7
  • [xamlc] fix compiled {OnPlatform} #9205
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0-servicing
  • Fix [Android] CollectionView EmptyView SelectionMode=Single on Android #9215
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Uncomment Editor TextChanges Test #6930
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-servicing
  • Simplify ShellItem Parenting #9221
    area/shell 🐢
